name: 01 PROJECTS
readme_content: Stores notes and files for active, time-bound tasks or deliverables.

name: 02 AREAS
readme_content: Contains ongoing responsibilities or areas of interest.

name: 03 RESOURCES
readme_content: Holds general reference materials and reusable templates.

name: 04 ARQUIVE
readme_content: Keeps inactive projects and outdated resources for future reference.
